title: Balloon-Powered Car
description: I designed and built a car that moves using the air from a balloon. I did lots of tests with different balloon sizes and car designs to find the one that goes the furthest!

title: Plant Growth Experiment
description: I set up an experiment to see how different types of water affect plant growth. I used tap water, filtered water, and rainwater to water identical bean plants for three weeks.

title: Simple Weather Station
description: Using a microcontroller and some sensors, I built a small weather station that measures temperature, humidity, and air pressure. The data is displayed on a small screen!

title: Solar System Model
description: I created a to-scale model of our solar system showing the relative sizes of the planets and their distances from the sun. I used different materials to show each planet's features.

title: Math Puzzle Game
description: I designed a fun math puzzle game that challenges players to solve problems using addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. I tested it with my classmates!

title: Recycled Materials Robot
description: Using only recycled materials from home, I built a robot model that can move its arms when you turn a handle. It shows how mechanical systems can work with simple materials.
